  7. def by_date(instance, filename):
  8. datepart = force_unicode(datetime.datetime.now().strftime(smart_str("%Y/%m/%d")))
  9. return os.path.join(datepart, get_valid_filename(filename))
  12. class prefixed_factory(object):
  13. def __init__(self, upload_to, prefix):
  14. self.upload_to = upload_to
  15. self.prefix = prefix

  22. if not self.prefix:
